items.title: Pumello and Cara Cara salad
items.descript: With pea shoots, preserved lemon, spicy almonds, avocado, ginger and lime.

items.title: Legumes Non Cuits
items.descript: Our version of a charcuterie platter. Cured beet, hot porcini mushroom sausage, apple and walnut pate, asparagus and sunflower terrine, creamy mustard, fig jam, pickled green apple and mustard seeds with soaked oat and flax bread

items.title: BBQ Shiitake Dumplings
items.descript: Chia seed and coconut wraps filled with shiitake, red onion,and jicama, served in a coconut amino, sassafras leaf and beads or paradise sauce..

items.title: Sunflower Seed Hummus
items.descript: Red black and white quinoa, baby kale, pepitas, cranberries, red cabbage, and carrots served with a whole grain mustard and nutmeg vinaigrette.

items.title: Green Papaya Noodles
items.descript: Kelp noodles, carrot, basil, mint, cucumber and daikon radish in a lime, ginger and goji berry sauce. With a spicy dehydrated peanuts and mango dust.

items.title: Crusted Oyster Mushroom Enchiladas
items.descript: Thinly sliced zucchini filled with coriander and flax crusted oyster mushrooms almond cotija cheese, avocado and chopped kale, topped with a chili and cacao sun dried tomato sauce, green onions and poblano peppers.

items.title: Spicy Plantain Curry
items.descript: Cherry tomato, carrot, red pepper and sweet potato in a sun dried tomato, ancho chili and coconut, curry sauce, served with parsnip and sunflower rice, plantain chips and basil edamame pure..

items.title: Creamy Green Bean Noodles
items.descript: Grain free noodles made of green beans and green peas with oyster mushrooms, cauliflower, baby kale and asparagus in a coconut milk, smoke and tomato sauce.

items.title: Jack Fruit Carnitas
items.descript: Shredded jack fruit cooked with onion and garlic served in a cacao and tomato sauce with brown rice, avocado, locally made corn tortillas, cashew sour cream and pickled onions topped with a cilantro and arugula salad.

items.title: Spicy Curried Brussel Sprouts
items.descript: Halved brussel sprouts, potatoes, onions, zucchini and spinach in a thick yellow curry and sunflower seed sauce served with brown rice, fresh parsley and avocado.

items.title: Rainbow Quinoa Salad
items.descript: Red black and white quinoa, baby kale, pepitas, cranberries, red cabbage and carrots served with a whole grain mustard and nutmeg vinaigrette.

items.title: Peanut Noodle Salad
items.descript: Grain free mung bean noodles. chopped spinach, red onion, red pepper, edemame and carrots tossed in a peanut butter sauce topped with crushed and toasted peanuts.

items.title: gardan salad
items.descript: Baby greens, kale, avocado, tomato, carrot, red pepper, cucumber and pumpkin seeds served with a balsamic and olive oil vinaigrette.

items.title: Red Velvet
items.descript: Beet tinted cacao and almond cake with white chocolate, cinnamon and cashew ganache. Served with persimmon sauce and fresh blackberries. Nut Free.

items.title: Double Chocolate Sandwich
items.descript: Pumpkin seed and cacao cookies with avocado and cacao butter fudge, fresh bananas and banana cream.

items.title: Strawberry Shortcake
items.descript: crushed coconut cake with vanilla macadamia cream, fresh strawberries and strawberry dust.

items.title: Green pea and lime ice cream
items.descript: served with pecan short bread, kumquat marmalade and local bee boy honey. (please tell your server if you do not eat honey)
